```{r ampulla 31425333, include=FALSE}

articles <- readRDS('~/JournalWatchPBPath/articles.rds')


PMID_31425333 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31425333', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31425333 <- paste0(PMID_31425333$journal,' ', PMID_31425333$year, ' ', PMID_31425333$month,';', PMID_31425333$volume,'(', PMID_31425333$number,'):', PMID_31425333$pages)

PubMed_31425333 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31425333$eprint)

doi_31425333 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31425333$doi)

dimensionBadge_31425333 <- paste0(dimensionString1, PMID_31425333$doi,dimensionString2)

altmetricBadge_31425333 <- paste0(altmetricString1, PMID_31425333$doi, altmetricString2 )

addthis_inline_31425333 <- paste0(addthis_String1, PMID_31425333$title , " PMID: 31425333" , addthis_String2)

Sys.sleep(1)


articles <- articles %>%

add_row(

ArticleCitation = PMID_31425333,
PMID = PMID_31425333$eprint,
Title = PMID_31425333$title,
# Author = PMID_31425333$author,
# Abstract = PMID_31425333$abstract,
Journal = PMID_31425333$journal,
Year = PMID_31425333$year,
Month = PMID_31425333$month,
# Volume = PMID_31425333$volume,
# Number = PMID_31425333$number,
# Pages = PMID_31425333$pages,
PubMedLink = paste0('https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/?term=', PMID_31425333$eprint),
DoiNumber = PMID_31425333$doi,
DoiLink = paste0('https://doi.org/', PMID_31425333$doi),
Language = PMID_31425333$language,
ISSN = PMID_31425333$issn
) %>%

unique()


Sys.sleep(1)

saveRDS(articles, '~/JournalWatchPBPath/articles.rds')
```
